Weekly topics:
Advanced Data Modeling and Database Design 
 Extended entity relationship model 
 Specialization hierarchy 
 Disjoint, overlapping and completeness constraints 
 Specialization, generalization & aggregation 
 Object-relational mapping and its applications 
2. Advanced SQL 
 Joins 
 Union Queries 
 Recursive queries with Common Table Expressions (CTEs) 
 Complex subqueries and correlated subqueries 
 SQL analytics functions 
 Views  
3. Database performance tuning and query optimization 
 Database performance tuning concepts 
 Query processing 
 Indexes and query optimization 
 SQL performance tuning 
 DBMS performance tuning 
 Managing Database physical storage space & performance tuning 
 

4. Transaction management and concurrency control 
 Transaction properties 
 Concurrency control  
 Concurrency control with locking methods 
 Concurrency control with time stamping methods 
 Concurrency control with optimistic methods 
 Database Recovery management  
5. Distributed database management system 
 Types of distributed databases (homogeneous, heterogeneous) 
 Data fragmentation (horizontal, vertical, hybrid) 
 Data replication and consistency models (eventual consistency, strong 
consistency) 
 The CAP theorem 
6. NOSQL Databases 
 Overview of NOSQL databases 
 Key differences from relational databases 
 Categories of NoSQL Databases 
 Design and querying in NOSQL databases(Data modeling, Query Languages 
and applications) 
 BASE properties (Basically Available, Soft state, Eventual consistency) 
 Techniques for achieving consistency and partitioning in NoSQL databases 
7. Cloud Databases and Database as a Service (DBaaS) 
 Differences between on-premise and cloud databases 
 Types of cloud databases: Managed services (e.g., Amazon RDS), Native cloud 
databases (e.g., Google BigQuery) 
 Database as a Service (DBaaS) 
o Benefits and challenges of DBaaS 
o Security and compliance in cloud databases 
o Performance considerations in cloud-based databases 
8. Emerging Trends and Research Topics 
 Blockchain and Distributed Ledger Technology 
 Graph Databases and Semantic Web 
 Machine Learning Integration 
o Using databases for machine learning model training 
o Managing large datasets and feature engineering 
o Automated machine learning and data pipeline management
